nodes.text: The Reentry was the sixth and final leg of the Dragonbane circuit. Like the first leg, The Long Run, this leg was clear and almost straight, which allowed for high-speed racing.

If the seasoned Dragonbane racer Sunny Bounder, who would usually win Dragonbane races, felt threatened by other racers, she was known to do anything to win during this leg, including trying to run them off course or cause them to crash. She was even known to shoot at her opponents.
